slide.description: Yogi is an industry leader in natural teas. As Technical lead from the start of the engagement I worked on taking an existing legacy site and refreshing/expanding the site to better educate users and expand their brand.
slide.footnote: Credits: Created while employed at Copious.
slide.title: Home

slide.description: A unique experience in that it is an information site first and foremost, but geared toward a retail product audience. The IA needed to make sure users felt like they were being led to the right teas without unnecessary complexity.
slide.footnote: Credits: Created while employed at Copious.
slide.title: Nav

slide.description: Evoking the experience of e-commerce organization, the categorization shows the user available products, but guides them to what they're interested in.

slide.title: Category

slide.description: The content rich product display page was important to really showcase and educate about the individual products. The interesting difference to e-commerce being that the primary call to action is to help find the product in your local grocery store.
